CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Vanilla Android LockScreen and Notifications
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables EUI customizations on lockscreen, statusbar, notifications, quicksettings etc

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Vanilla Recent Apps
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables EUI Control Center and Enable vanilla Recent Apps

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Transparent Notifications
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables EUI's Transparent notifications instead of Dark Material Theme

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Semi Transparent Status Bar
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: EUI apps don't respect default transparent Android status bar background. Enable this to show semi transparent status bar for them. (Only EUI apps)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Standard Scale Mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Force disable Zoom Scale mode of EUI when rooted!
